name: GreenMem® GM500P-0510
description: GreenMem® GM500P-0510 operates as an industrial filter aid, distinguished by its cost-effectiveness, ample surface area, and reduced energy consumption. Renowned for its swift separation speed and minimal CO2 emissions, it excels in various processes, including wax removal, solvent recovery, API concentration and purification, free fatty acid removal, and the recovery of homogeneous catalysts. Additionally, it demonstrates proficiency in hydrocarbon separation, lipid removal, monomer removal, and solvent exchange, making it a versatile solution for industrial applications.
